New Records: Seth Lugo achieved his 15th win of the season.
Tommy Pham hit his eighth home run of the season.
Key Match Events: Tommy Pham belted a three-run home run in the fourth inning.
Seth Lugo limited the Guardians to one run on six hits in seven innings.
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals were looking to damage the Guardians' playoff chances.
The Guardians were without Josh Naylor due to back spasms.
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland manager Stephen Vogt praised Lugo's performance.
Guardians relievers covered four scoreless frames.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the final regular-season meeting between the two teams.
Erick Sabrowski made his Major League debut.
Others: The loss snapped Cleveland's three-game winning streak.
The Royals matched the Twins at 4 1/2 games behind Cleveland in the AL Central race.
